text: The 1988 Vuelta a España was the 43rd edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, with an individual time trial on 25 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 5 May with a stage to Valdezcaray. The race finished in Madrid on 15 May. ==Stage 1== 25 April 1988 — Santa Cruz de Tenerife to Santa Cruz de Tenerife, (ITT) {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- !
